verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H4393"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w* holds, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w floods|strong="H5104"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* sustains \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*?

\w The|strong="H5375"\w* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w pure|strong="H1249"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w sets|strong="H5375"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w upon|strong="H5375"\w* sinful \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w swears|strong="H7650"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* intent \w to|strong="H3824"\w* deceive:

\w they|strong="H3068"\w* win \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*: \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* champion \w and|strong="H3068"\w* savior.

\w Such|strong="H2088"\w* must \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H2088"\w* \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w resort|strong="H1875"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs* The Lords’s Triumphal Entry into the Sanctuary

\w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* – Higher, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*; welcome \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

“\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?” “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w strong|strong="H1368"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* heroic, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* heroic \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.”

\w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* – Higher, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*; welcome \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

“\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?” “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.” \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*
